attributes.comment:
I think this fee increase is unfair, considering the fact that benefit of this fee
increase will be available to people who will file in future.
Why the current applicants should pay for service which is going to be rendered to
future applicants.

I think USCIS should raise money thru Bond for its modernization drive and collect
money , by increased fee from the future applicants who will be actually benefitted.

Just like when govt. constructs a bridge by raising money thru bond, and then
collect toll from people who actually use that bridge to pay-off the bond.

Secondly, fee increase is too high, just because immigrants have no-choice they
should burdened with high fee. No other gov agency, serving citizens can do this
as there will be electoral conseequence. Can you imagine DMV changing vehicle
registeration fee from $200 to $400... and it goes unnoticed?
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Pradeep
